properties.name: 19 B Main St Durham, NH
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman8219 B Main St Durham, NH 03824Where we first met, kissed, fell in love....

properties.name: 2 Webster Place
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82Webster St, East Boston, MAI lived here from September 28th until April 1st! There were some crazy roommates and insane things happening... and you listened to them all! However, I also met Allison, who I live with now in South Boston! One of our favorite things about this place was how we always had somewhere to escape to, my bedroom was tucked away in a deep corner of the house and there was a Beautiful roofdeck!

properties.name: Crazy Joan's House!
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82182 Greenwood Ave, Vineyard Haven, MAWe spent many happy sunny mornings.... days... laying in bed together here. We also ate take out sushi & fried scallops here... you saw the gross fleas due to the cats... we watched the first Red Sox game together here... and you fixed my window screen with Carlos\' help!

properties.name: Friendly's in Conneticut
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82Washington St, Middletown, CTWe stopped for lunch on one of the drives to NJ... I think this one was on the way to Tiffany\'s wedding :)

properties.name: Jack's childhood home
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82466 Westfield St, dedham, mAWe spent New Year\'s 2006 here. We went out to dinner with Katie and Jack at Joe\'s... then back to Jack\'s house for a rousing game of Apples to Apples before toasting to the New Year! We also drank some bucket margaritas :)

properties.name: Memorial Union Building (MUB)
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82Library Way, Durham, NH 03824This is where my graduation ceremony was, where you took photos for me & sat with my family! What a fun way to spend the evening... woohoo... not to mention that I arranged the whole evening, you were so supportive! Thanks!

properties.name: My childhood home
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman824 Fountain Ave, Piscataway, NJWe spent a whole week here! We spent lots of time with my family (especially Lacey). We went to Tiffany and Tim\'s wedding in Bridgewater, we visited my father\'s office in NYC & saw a broadway show (the producers)... and we hung out with a random selection of my old friends from home!

properties.name: The Jetty near Lobsterville Rd
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82Lobsterville Rd, Chilmark, MAHere\'s where we drove to and I took my favorite photo of you ever! We had a nice romantic afternoon climbing around on the jetty, and you didn\'t even tell me to be careful a thousand times ;) I think of this evening as one of our more romantic ones...

properties.name: The Library Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82Â State St, Portsmouth, NHThis is where we had my graduation dinner. My grandfather told you the story about how his blood type changed! My mother almost thought you believed him and thought it was hysterical!!

properties.name: The Minidorms!
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82mcdaniel drive, Durham NH 03824This is where you lived when we first met... and most of your friends! We spent a few afternoons there, but you snuck me in the backdoor!

properties.name: Your NH apartment your senior year
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman825 Bennett Way, Newmarket, NHWe spent many weekends here, too... your roommates Jack & Ed are good friends of yours (although Ed\'s not quite as fastidiously clean as you\'d like)... we spent my birthday here (I came up to visit you)... we also went out to a lot of fun restaurants in Portsmouth & we spent your birthday there, too! (Happy 21st!)

properties.name: Your childhood home
properties.description: Posted by Jhinman82Rosemary Ave, Wakefield, MAThis is where you grew up, our springing point for the long day of apartment shopping when I lived on the vineyard & needed to move to Boston! You showed me some of your favorite things from home here... and we watched super embarassing movies from your parents\' cottage in Maine!
